PairingType
===========

Properties
----------

NONE
   Only connect if no pairing is required

FIRST_SCREEN
   Prompt the user on the TV to accept paring

PIN
   Display a PIN on the TV, require user to enter it on the device

MIXED
   Prompt the user on the TV to accept pairing. Also display a pin on
   the TV that the user can enter on the device.

AIRPLAY_MIRRORING
   Require AirPlay mirroring to be enabled for connection (iOS only)
